title: Best of the Program | 4/25/22
description:
Pat Gray joins Stu to discuss the failure of CNN+. Pat and Stu discuss California’s latest radical abortion legislation. President Biden announced the intention for every car to be climate-friendly, and Pat and Stu have some thoughts. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
